text: HTLV-I pACH infectious molecular clone has been described previously [ 30 ] .
pFR-luc , pFA-CMV , pFA2 - <extra_id_0> CREB-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and pFA2 - <extra_id_0> c-Jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were purchased from Stratagene .

pFA - <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( encoding a fusion protein consisting of the <extra_id_0> Gal4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA - binding domain fused in - frame to HTLV-I <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) was constructed by PCR amplification of HTLV-I <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> using pCMV4 - <extra_id_0> Tax <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> as a template and BamHI / BglII-tagged primers .
The amplified insert was digested and ligated into the BamHI / BglII sites of pFA-CMV .
Plasmid contents were confirmed by DNA sequencing .
